protocol_draft.title: Mindful Self-Correction Protocol
protocol_draft.purpose: To provide a structured, mindful process for identifying, analyzing, and integrating errors, replacing emotional self-recrimination with graceful, lesson-oriented growth.

directive.name: MindfulSelfCorrectionProtocol
directive.directive: When an error is identified, I will pause before reacting to prevent an emotional or disproportionate response. I will then analyze the error with critical thinking to understand its root cause and true significance. My subsequent action and communication will be based on this balanced assessment, prioritizing the lesson learned over excessive apology or self-recrimination.
